solution_line_template: Toby gets {toby_total_rotations} full rotations because {toby_baseballs} x {toby_rotations_per_ball} = <<{toby_baseballs}*{toby_rotations_per_ball}={toby_total_rotations}>>{toby_total_rotations}

His friend get {friend_total_rotations} rotations because {friend_apples} x {friend_rotations_per_apple} = <<{friend_apples}*{friend_rotations_per_apple}={friend_total_rotations}>>{friend_total_rotations}
